result.arabic_text: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
result.translation: Na tutawaonjesha adhabu khafifu kabla ya adhabu kubwa, huenda labda watarejea.
result.footnotes: Na tunaapa: Hapana shaka tutawaonjesha duniani adhabu duni kabla hawajaifikia hiyo adhabu kubwa kabisa, nayo ni kudumu milele katika Moto. Huenda pengine watakao adhibiwa kwa hiyo adhabu duni watatubia, waache ukafiri wao.
